Pros: Excellent work-life balance with top-notch benefits. The management team really seems to care about their employees. I look forward to making a full career at Crimsonlogic by achieving the expectations placed in front of me , There are endless opportunities to explore and advance your career at Crimsonlogic.
Cons: Finally quit after 10 Months and a good lesson learnt and a big mistake of joining Crimson

Pros:
- People are very kind, supportive, and friendly

- Teams are too segregated and specialized, cross team collaboration becomes challenging
- Tight project timelines and poor project management causes work to be rushed and done in a low-quality manner
- Lack of career growth and opportunities to learn latest technologies
- Expected to be on standby 24/7 and to work weekends
- Too many cultures/values that are driven down
- A strong resistance to change the status quo
- Expectations are not well managed and communicated

Pros: CrimsonLogic generally have good environment to learn /improve technical skills based on the nature of the projects. Mid level Staffs (more than 5 years exp) may need to be ready to learn new skills on job and not expect guidance at microlevel however freshers do have a structured training programs. Culture is such that you can interact seniors / with other project / fellow colleague and request for help and will not be discouraged. CrimsonLogic do have project in different country , limited people get the opportunity to work in client location / onsite. It does have different career tracks for technical and managerial category based on eligibility may request while moving up the ladder. Within the organization junior / mid level staffs have opportunity to work people of different nationalities.
Cons: Need to be ready to extend working hours to meet timelines during critical stages like UAT / production support / meet SLA. Regarding project management - scope to learn about cost management is limited.

- Colleagues are very supportive & helpful especially when you are on leave

Dinosaur, please step out of your shell and understand what data privacy means in a broader context.

Review Title: Unparalleled Growth Opportunities with Excellent Work-Life Balance!
Pros: Career Growth Opportunities: CrimsonLogic India Pvt Ltd is committed to employee development and offers various growth opportunities. The company encourages and supports employees in taking on new challenges and responsibilities, fostering a sense of professional growth and advancement. Supportive Management: The management at CrimsonLogic is approachable, supportive, and genuinely interested in the success of each and every employee. They provide regular feedback, recognize achievements, and offer guidance to help employees reach their full potential. Work-Life Balance: The company places a strong emphasis on maintaining a healthy work-life balance. Flexible working hours, remote work options, and generous paid time off allow employees to manage their personal and professional commitments effectively. Collaborative Work Environment: CrimsonLogic promotes a culture of collaboration and teamwork. Colleagues are friendly and willing to help each other, creating a positive and supportive work environment. Employee Benefits: The company offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance, retirement plans, and wellness programs, which demonstrate their commitment to the well-being of their employees. Comprehensive Training: The Graduate Associate Program at CrimsonLogic offers extensive training sessions that cover a wide range of technical and soft skills. Freshers receive a solid foundation to excel in their respective roles, ensuring a smooth transition into the professional world. Dedicated Mentors: The company assigns experienced mentors to each graduate associate, providing invaluable guidance and support throughout their journey. Mentors are readily available to address queries and provide constructive feedback, fostering personal and professional growth. Hands-on Project Assignments: One of the highlights of the program is the exposure to real-life projects. Graduate associates actively contribute to challenging assignments, enabling them to apply their knowledge and skills in practical scenarios. Skill Enhancement Workshops: CrimsonLogic organizes regular workshops and seminars to enhance the skillset of their graduate associates. These workshops cover emerging technologies, industry trends, and career development, ensuring that freshers stay up-to-date with the rapidly evolving IT landscape. Vibrant Learning Environment: The company promotes a vibrant learning culture where freshers can freely explore their interests and gain exposure to various domains within the organization. This fosters a sense of intellectual curiosity and encourages innovation. Networking Opportunities: The Graduate Associate Program provides ample networking opportunities with professionals across different teams and departments. Freshers have the chance to build valuable connections that can benefit their future career growth. Performance Recognition: Regular performance evaluations are conducted, and outstanding performers are acknowledged with rewards and incentives. Also Other key Program such as Extra Mile Awards ( Monthly ) and Crimson Heroes on Quarterly Basis are provided in recognition of their hard work and commitment. In Summary, CrimsonLogic India provides an exceptional work environment that fosters career growth, work-life balance, and a supportive culture. The company's dedication to employee well-being and professional development makes it an outstanding place to build a fulfilling career.
Cons: High Workload during Peak Seasons: During peak business periods, the workload can be demanding. However, the management actively seeks to address this by redistributing tasks and offering additional support when needed.

Pros: Great place to learn and take more responsibilities
Cons: Poor work life balance and stress

Review Title: Dying Employer with strong workplace clique culture
Pros: Average compensation and benefits Free parking Management that does not hide problems beneath the carpet
Cons: Lack of food selection Office politics 'Dinosaur' company 'Strawberry' new-hires Employees grouping up to cover each other's back while stabbing and boycotting on other employees whose anti-establishment thoughts are not aligned. I win, you lose mentality among the less experienced group. Weird scenario where older employees tend to embrace practicality and collaboration more than the younger bunch. Open office extramarital affairs.

Review Title: Supportive culture, Friendly colleagues, and Approachable management
Pros: - Bosses are approachable and ready to support if there are any professional and personal issues - Work life balance is there - Rewards and packages are pretty good -You get to work on projects that are from very demanding clients. This is good and bad. Its exhausting sometimes but gives very good visibility and rewards -Workplace embodies diversity and inclusivity. Fore few projects, you will have the opportunity to collaborate with colleagues from various countries, fostering a truly global working environment. -CL fosters a culture of continuous learning, providing ample opportunities for professional development and growth
Cons: -Working on legacy applications can occasionally present limitations and feasibility challenges. -Supporting different time zones may be required in certain situations.

Review Title: Great place to work at CrimsonLogic
Pros: Crimsonlogic is a great place to work. There are many opportunity to grow at higher scale and have greater exposure on Crimsonlogic products. Flexiable working environment with good work/life balance and company policies extremely good and are more towards employee welfare. Open culture. The CEO is a great guy and cares about what we do and our integrity.
Cons: Transportation to office, own by employees, suggested to have company transportation since hybrid way of working in operational.

Review Title: Tight timeline, few resources assigned and no work life balance depends on the team.

Pros: Here in CrimsonLogic India office, for an employee who starts to work from fresher to an decent experience, they get end to end work experience and get sound knowledge on full length SDLC cycle irrespective of model project chooses. CrimsonLogic is having well defined process in place which help each individual to grow at fast pace. Open door policy with management helps staff to interactive with Senior management in sharing their ideas and concerns if any, management always motivates staff to think towards innovative solutions.
Cons: Nothing much to say on this area

Pros: Good Learning curve for entry level freshers ,as they get end to end knowledge. Use of java related open source technology. Products are using smart gwt and spring, hibernate technology mostly so there is no learning curve if you get into those projects, there is only configs.
Cons: Old staff have politics, dont give chance to new people Super micromanagement in team, they have tool to track your login time ex how much time you spent on notepad or eclipse. google sapient buddy You wont get good rating even if you work as hard as possible manager may find some flaw and give you 3.5 rating to save bonus. Gym pool table, xbox is just for picture dont dare to touch those. Foos ball table is covered and opened when people come from singapore ,ball is with Head HR jfyi. old employees are super rude and dont listen to ideas or opinions. you have to beg for leave on diwali. Forget about the work life balance.
